Player History
Drafted in 22nd round, 347th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/6/2015, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2015, off Kyle Pantoja (KC)...
Injured on 9/1/2015 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,297,143 through salary arbitration...
Traded from New York to Chicago on 7/20/2016 (Going to CHI: P Roy Fisk, SS Tony Pastrana, P Paul Killgore. Going to NY: 1B Nathan Carballosa, P Jordan Goss)...
Released by Chicago on 10/20/2016...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/6/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $845,000 per year...
Traded from San Francisco to Philadelphia on 7/25/2017 (Going to SF: P Les Marcum, RF George Nakamura. Going to PHI: SS Tony Pastrana)...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/8/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Injured on 4/1/2019 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2019, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2019, hitting .364 with 2 HR, 22 RBI...
Released by Kansas City on 10/5/2020...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/5/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $4,444,444 per year...
